Text: Onu nayo̩ ef ukpahiu-we̩, O Jihofa;
Uwe̩ mʼe̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-wñ ñeju du ñw u me̩,
Todu e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ ko ledʼo chʼe̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ du ñw u;
I bi iñmi ugbo-we̩; uwe̩ mʼu du ñw u,
Uwe̩ mʼowñ du chʼe̩nyo̩ edu ñw one̩ gbogbo alo;
Uwe̩ ache ma ku ma dab aido e-una iko kʼeju-we̩ dʼane̩.
Todu uwe̩ aje̩ ñw ma dʼubi gba;
Uwe̩ ki hi o̩la-we̩ ne ef ukpahiu-we̩, O Jihofa!
